reviewText: Loved the play when we saw it.  Now I can watch it whenever I want.
Thank you for the fast delivery. My daughter is going to be very happy that I found this DVD for her. We had gone to this program several times. Thanks for having it. Thanks,
Beautiful!  I have enjoyed watching the DVD!

Ordering and delivery was fine.  While there are no flaws on the DVD itself, the recording is only VHS quality at best.  But, the DVD is out of print, and since The Crystal Cathedral is no more, there won't be any new recordings of this.
This is a true delight. I highly recommend this nativity play. It came fast and in excellent condition. A family must have.
